title: vAlmIki mAmuniyE
sahitya:
vAlmIki mAmuniyE inda vaiyam vaNanguginra vara kavi arasanE


anupallavi

  nAl vEda sArattai rAmAyaNamAga nalginai ovvoru nALum paDittuNara


caraNam    teLLiya naDai azhagum adan deivap-poruLazhagum uLLam 
kavaruginra Om rAma nAmam pOl Onguga nin pugazh oLirugavE ayya
